Message:
How much power can
the Tree of Life give?

How long does a
homunculus-turned-witch
have to live?

Everything is new to me,
so I don’t have a clue.

But I’m sure my time
with Little A will be short.

We might have 10 more years...
or we might have until tomorrow...

I’m bound to accept punishment
for my sins one day,

Even if what lies ahead is
the most painful of goodbyes...

Even if my soul will be
shattered to pieces...

I will never forget
all the warm memories
Little A gave me...
for the rest of my life.
